DataStax | OpsCenter Engineer | REMOTE | https://datastax.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/DataStaxCareers...

DataStax OpsCenter is the management and monitoring web application for the DataStax Enterprise (DSE) platform. DSE, based on Apache Cassandra, is a database specifically designed to efficiently distribute and replicate your data across multiple data centers, cloud regions, or hybrid environments.

The OpsCenter codebase currently consists of Java, Python, Clojure, and JavaScript. Familiarity with one or more of these is important, but even more important is the passion and ability to work on any part of an application and ability to learn and adapt quickly as the application and technologies underneath evolve.
